warning_title.description: Shown as the title of the pop-up notification warning.

warning_body.message: You are not currently protected by Brave. Click here to learn more.
warning_body.description: Shown as the primary body text of the pop-up notification warning.

warning_return.message: Return to Brave for a safer experience.
warning_return.description: One of a few possible, smaller context messages, shown below the main message.

brave_last_default.message: Brave was the default as of $DATE$.
